Test Name: Cancer-Associated Retinopathy Panel (CARP) by Immunoblot and IHC
Specimen Type: Retinal tissue (protein lysate or paraffin-embedded sections)
Purpose: To detect and characterize retinal autoantibodies associated with cancer-associated retinopathy using immunoblot and immunohistochemistry.
Container: Microcentrifuge tube for protein lysate or formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded tissue block/slide
Equipment: Gel electrophoresis system, immunoblot transfer apparatus, incubator for IHC, microscope with camera
